QAData.question: Who won between Burnley and West Ham United on Sat, 25 Nov 2023 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: West Ham United won 2–1 over Burnley on Sat, 25 Nov 2023 15:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Johann Berg Gudmundsson created the most chances (4) in the match.
